fields.summary: non-'eucalyptus' accounts error out when being created on multiple region cloud

comments.body:
The issue was that we resolved the host to an IP too early, causing the lookup of the expected SSL certificate to fail (this would also have broken host verification)

Workarounds were to configure the IP in the endpoint or to configure trust of the certificate by adding to the trust store.
The fix causes a reverse lookup and we are now always using the host name for the identity service, including in the output of euca-describe-services.
